Uses of Class
net.finmath.montecarlo.assetderivativevaluation.products.BermudanOption.ExerciseMethod

  • Packages that use BermudanOption.ExerciseMethod 
    Package Description
    net.finmath.montecarlo.assetderivativevaluation.products
    Products which may be valued using an AssetModelMonteCarloSimulationModel.

    • Uses of BermudanOption.ExerciseMethod in net.finmath.montecarlo.assetderivativevaluation.products

      Methods in net.finmath.montecarlo.assetderivativevaluation.products that return BermudanOption.ExerciseMethod

      static BermudanOption.ExerciseMethod BermudanOption.ExerciseMethod.valueOf​(String name)
      Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
      static BermudanOption.ExerciseMethod[] BermudanOption.ExerciseMethod.values()
      Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
      Constructors in net.finmath.montecarlo.assetderivativevaluation.products with parameters of type BermudanOption.ExerciseMethod 
      Constructor Description
      BermudanOption​(double[] exerciseDates, double[] notionals, double[] strikes, BermudanOption.ExerciseMethod exerciseMethod)
      Create a Bermudan option paying N(i) * (S(T(i)) - K(i)) at T(i), when exercised in T(i), where N(i) is the notional, S is the underlying, K(i) is the strike and T(i) the exercise date.
